original: @92a # // rgya gar skad du /üîΩlo ke shva ra sto tra n'a ma /
analyzed: @92a # // rgya gar skad du / lo ke shva ra sto tra n'a ma /
translated: In Sanskrit:üîΩLokeshvarastotra-nama

original: bod skad du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: bod skad du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa zhes bya ba /
translated: In Tibetan: Praise to the Lord of the World

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Lord of the World!

original: lha dang lha min gyis ni zhabs btung cing //
analyzed: lha dang lha min gyis ni zhabs btung cing //
translated: Whose feet are worshipped by gods and demigods,

original: skye rga na dang 'chi ba rab bcom pa //
analyzed: skye rga na dang 'chi ba rab bcom pa //
translated: Who has utterly conquered birth, old age, sickness, and death,

original: 'jig rten dbang byed bdag la skyabs mdzad na //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang byed bdag la skyabs mdzad na //
translated: Please grant me refuge, O Lord of the World,

original: brtse dang snying rje ldan pa skyong bar mdzod //
analyzed: brtse dang snying rje ldan pa skyong bar mdzod //
translated: And protect me with love and compassion.

original: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i dbus su nges lhung ba //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i dbus su nges lhung ba //
translated: Having fallen into the midst of the ocean of samsara,

original: nyon mongs dba' klong mnyam bzhag gis ni bcom //
analyzed: nyon mongs dba' klong mnyam bzhag gis ni bcom //
translated: I have been overcome by the waves of afflictions.

original: kho bo brtan par zung zhes kun du du //
analyzed: kho bo brtan par zung zhes kun du du //
translated: Please hold me firmly, O protector,

original: brtse ba chen po khyed la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: brtse ba chen po khyed la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you, O Great Compassionate One.

original: mig la sred pa'i rab rib nye bar 'tshe //
analyzed: mig la sred pa'i rab rib nye bar 'tshe //
translated: The afflictions of craving for the eyes torment me,

original: lus ni 'chi bas 'jigs pa'i rnam par du //
analyzed: lus ni 'chi bas 'jigs pa'i rnam par du //
translated: And my body is filled with fear of death.

original: ji srid mnar med nyam ngar ma song bar //
analyzed: ji srid mnar med nyam ngar ma song bar //
translated: Until I have gone to the terrible Avici hell,

original: bcom ldan kun tu gzigs la bdag la skyongs //
analyzed: bcom ldan kun tu gzigs la bdag la skyongs //
translated: Please protect me, O All-Seeing Bhagavan.

original: gzhan gyi bud med sun par byas shing bcom //
analyzed: gzhan gyi bud med sun par byas shing bcom //
translated: I have insulted and raped the wives of others,

original: mi shes pa yi srog chags stong phrag bsad //
analyzed: mi shes pa yi srog chags stong phrag bsad //
translated: And killed thousands of ignorant living beings.

original: mgon po bdag gis sdig pa ma lus byas //
analyzed: mgon po bdag gis sdig pa ma lus byas //
translated: O Protector, I have committed every kind of evil.

original: so so'i lus kyi nyes pa nyams par mdzod //
analyzed: so so'i lus kyi nyes pa nyams par mdzod //
translated: Please heal the wounds of my body and mind.

original: gang zhig 'tsho dang bkur sti'i ched rnams su//
analyzed: gang zhig 'tsho dang bkur sti'i ched rnams su//
translated: For the sake of livelihood and honor,

original: 'jig rten pa rnams mi 'dod mi bden smras //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa rnams mi 'dod mi bden smras //
translated: Worldly people speak untruth and what is unpleasant.üîΩMay the Lord of the World pacify

original: ma lus dmyal ba gang gis yun ring goms //üîΩde rnams 'jig rten dbang pos zhi bar mdzod //
analyzed: ma lus dmyal ba gang gis yun ring goms // de rnams 'jig rten dbang pos zhi bar mdzod //
translated: All the sufferings of the hells that they have long endured.

original: sems can rnams la mi phan bsam pa gang //
analyzed: sems can rnams la mi phan bsam pa gang //
translated: Whatever thoughts I have had that do not benefit sentient beings,

original: rang dang gzhan gyis byas la'ang yi rang ba //
analyzed: rang dang gzhan gyis byas la'ang yi rang ba //
translated: And whatever I have rejoiced in, whether done by myself or others,üîΩMay the Protector, who is free from all faults,

original: de 'dir bdag gi yid kyi sdig pa rnams //
analyzed: de 'dir bdag gi yid kyi sdig pa rnams //
translated: Remove all these mental negativities of mine.

original: bsal @92b bar mdzod cig mgon po smre sngags 'don //
analyzed: bsal @92b bar mdzod cig mgon po smre sngags 'don //
translated: I have heard you say that you will protectüîΩAll sentient beings, wherever they may be,

original: lha dang mi dang lha min skye ba rnams //
analyzed: lha dang mi dang lha min skye ba rnams //
translated: Whether born as gods, humans, or demigods,

original: dud 'gro dmyal ba yi dgas 'gro ba rnams //üîΩsems can nges gnas rtag par nyam thag gang //üîΩde rnams srung zhes khyed gtam bdag gis thos //
analyzed: dud 'gro dmyal ba yi dgas 'gro ba rnams //üîΩsems can nges gnas rtag par nyam thag gang //üîΩde rnams srung zhes khyed gtam bdag gis thos //
translated: Or as animals, hungry ghosts, or hell beings.

original: des na bdag la snying rjer kun du mdzod //
analyzed: des na bdag la snying rjer kun du mdzod //
translated: Therefore, have compassion for me.

original: lus kyi lang tsho ngal bar rtogs gyur na //
analyzed: lus kyi lang tsho ngal bar rtogs gyur na //
translated: Having understood that the youth of the body is exhausted,

original: ji srid dmyal ba nyid du ma zhugs par //
analyzed: ji srid dmyal ba nyid du ma zhugs par //
translated: For as long as I have not entered the hells,

original: de phyir bcom ldan khyed la gsol bar bgyi //
analyzed: de phyir bcom ldan khyed la gsol bar bgyi //
translated: Therefore, I supplicate you, BhagavƒÅn.

original: cung zad btang snyoms mdzad pa gzhan don phyir //
analyzed: cung zad btang snyoms mdzad pa gzhan don phyir //
translated: For the sake of others, please be a little indifferent.

original: bdag gi don phyir /
analyzed: bdag gi don phyir /
translated: For my sake,

original: bdag gi don phyir bcom ldan nyid dmigs na //
analyzed: bdag gi don phyir bcom ldan nyid dmigs na //
translated: For my sake, BhagavƒÅn, please consider

original: yang na brtse ba bsod nams la ltos sam //
analyzed: yang na brtse ba bsod nams la ltos sam //
translated: Either your compassion or your merit.

original: gang la phongs med mthong ba bskyed par gyis //
analyzed: gang la phongs med mthong ba bskyed par gyis //
translated: Please generate the vision of one who is not destitute.

original: nyid dran pa yis kun nas yongs tshim na //
analyzed: nyid dran pa yis kun nas yongs tshim na //
translated: Having been completely satisfied by the recollection of you,

original: nyes pa zad par mdzod cig brtse med dam //
analyzed: nyes pa zad par mdzod cig brtse med dam //
translated: Please exhaust my faults, O Compassionate One.

original: de yi phyir na bcom ldan gzhan phan mkhas //
analyzed: de yi phyir na bcom ldan gzhan phan mkhas //
translated: Therefore, BhagavƒÅn, skilled in benefiting others,

original: rnam g-yeng ma mdzad kho bo 'dir ni srungs //
analyzed: rnam g-yeng ma mdzad kho bo 'dir ni srungs //
translated: Do not be distracted, but protect me here.üîΩElephants, horses, sons, wives,

original: glang po rta dang bu dang chung ma dang // rgyal srid tsher ma med dang khyim sna tshogs //
analyzed: glang po rta dang bu dang chung ma dang // rgyal srid tsher ma med dang khyim sna tshogs //
translated: A thorn-free kingdom, various homes,

original: sha rus mgo dang khrag gi mthar thug par //
analyzed: sha rus mgo dang khrag gi mthar thug par //
translated: Up to flesh, bones, head, and blood,

original: don gnyer rnams la khyed kyis mtha' yas byin //
analyzed: don gnyer rnams la khyed kyis mtha' yas byin //
translated: You bestow the infinite upon those who seek it.üîΩThe attainments of eye medicine, elixir, swift-footedness,

original: mig sman ri lu rkang mgyogs grub pa dang // grub pa'i sman dang nor bu rnam dag sngags //
analyzed: mig sman ri lu rkang mgyogs grub pa dang // grub pa'i sman dang nor bu rnam dag sngags //
translated: The pure mantras of the perfected medicine and jewel,üîΩThe attainment of the yak·π£i·πáƒ´ who enters the town,

original: grub pa gnod sbyin mo ni grong la 'jug /'jig rten dbang po gang gis nyid dgyes pa //
analyzed: grub pa gnod sbyin mo ni grong la 'jug /'jig rten dbang po gang gis nyid dgyes pa //
translated: The one who delights in the Lord of the World,

original: rkang lag rnam par lta ba'i sman pa gang //
analyzed: rkang lag rnam par lta ba'i sman pa gang //
translated: The physician who looks at the limbs,

original: sna tshogs 'jigs chen nad kyis zhub gang //
analyzed: sna tshogs 'jigs chen nad kyis zhub gang //
translated: The one afflicted by various great fears and illnesses,

original: khyed mnyes pa las de rnams lus rgyas shid //
analyzed: khyed mnyes pa las de rnams lus rgyas shid //
translated: Through pleasing you, their bodies become full.

original: nad med yon tan zab mo'i rnam rol 'gyur //
analyzed: nad med yon tan zab mo'i rnam rol 'gyur //
translated: They become free from disease, the display of profound qualities.

original: mkha' lding sbrul dang gza' dang mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: mkha' lding sbrul dang gza' dang mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: The garu·∏ças, nƒÅgas, planets, and ·∏çƒÅkinƒ´s,

original: sbyor ba pa rnams rtag par zhi 'thob cing //
analyzed: sbyor ba pa rnams rtag par zhi 'thob cing //
translated: The practitioners always attain peace.

original: khyed mnyes gang yin de yi mdun du ni //
analyzed: khyed mnyes gang yin de yi mdun du ni //
translated: For those who please you,

original: gshan rje'i pho nya mi 'gro rgyal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gshan rje'i pho nya mi 'gro rgyal bar 'gyur //
translated: The messengers of Yama do not go in front.

original: de phyir lag pa spyi bor thal sbyar te //
analyzed: de phyir lag pa spyi bor thal sbyar te //
translated: Therefore, with hands folded on the head,

original: spyi brtol mi brtan ngag gis nyin re bzhin //
analyzed: spyi brtol mi brtan ngag gis nyin re bzhin //
translated: With unsteady words of great pride,

original: du ba skyabs med bdag ni mchi ba la //
analyzed: du ba skyabs med bdag ni mchi ba la //
translated: I, the one without refuge, am crying.

original: bcom ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug 'dor ram ci //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug 'dor ram ci //
translated: ‚ÄúWhy do you abandon the Lord of the World?

original: mi srun yul la g-yo ba yid dbang po //
analyzed: mi srun yul la g-yo ba yid dbang po //
translated: The mind, the sense of touch, is fickle in an unruly land.

original: mi brtan lus kyis sdig pa mang byas shing //
analyzed: mi brtan lus kyis sdig pa mang byas shing //
translated: The body, unstable, has committed many sins.

original: lto ba'i ched du 'khrul zhing 'bras bu med //
analyzed: lto ba'i ched du 'khrul zhing 'bras bu med //
translated: It is confused for the sake of the belly and is fruitless.

original: bdag gi 'di ni skye bo thams cad lugs //
analyzed: bdag gi 'di ni skye bo thams cad lugs //
translated: This is the way of all people.

original: gang gi lus kyi sdug bsngal ma myong bar //
analyzed: gang gi lus kyi sdug bsngal ma myong bar //
translated: Without experiencing the suffering of the body,

original: khyed kyi mngon sum du ni bzang 'gro ba //
analyzed: khyed kyi mngon sum du ni bzang 'gro ba //
translated: you have gone to a good rebirth, as is evident to you.üîΩI, with palms joined, bow down to you.

original: bdag 'dir thal sbyar rab btud bdag gi de //
analyzed: bdag 'dir thal sbyar rab btud bdag gi de //
translated: Please do this for me right now,

original: 'jig @93a * //üîΩrten dbang phyug da lta nyid du mdzod //
analyzed: 'jig @93a * // rten dbang phyug da lta nyid du mdzod //
translated: O Lord of the World.

original: rmongs dang zhe sdang rnam par nyams pa'i rgyu //
analyzed: rmongs dang zhe sdang rnam par nyams pa'i rgyu //
translated: The cause of the destruction of delusion and hatred,

original: khyod ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i zam pa ste //
analyzed: khyod ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i zam pa ste //
translated: you are the bridge over the ocean of sa·πÉsƒÅra,üîΩthe hand that pulls up those who have fallen into the abyss,

original: g-yang sar lhung ba gyen du 'dren pa'i phyag / khyod ni nyes lci'i mtshan mo'i sgra gcan nam //
analyzed: g-yang sar lhung ba gyen du 'dren pa'i phyag / khyod ni nyes lci'i mtshan mo'i sgra gcan nam //
translated: the RƒÅhu of the heavy night of faults.

original: bde gshegs bla med bstan pa de kho na //
analyzed: bde gshegs bla med bstan pa de kho na //
translated: The unsurpassed teaching of the Sugata is that very thing.

original: khyod ni sdug bsngal mang po'i sems can skyong //
analyzed: khyod ni sdug bsngal mang po'i sems can skyong //
translated: You protect beings with many sufferings.

original: rgyal dka' yid dkrugs bdud las nges rgyal zhing //
analyzed: rgyal dka' yid dkrugs bdud las nges rgyal zhing //
translated: You have conquered the difficult victory, the difficult mind, and the demon.

original: khyed ni srid pa'i mtsho las pha rol brgal //
analyzed: khyed ni srid pa'i mtsho las pha rol brgal //
translated: You have gone beyond the ocean of existence.

original: nad kun mtha' yas nges par gcod mdzad lus //
analyzed: nad kun mtha' yas nges par gcod mdzad lus //
translated: You have definitely cut off the endless diseases.

original: khyed sku 'gro ba kun la mchog tu mdzes //
analyzed: khyed sku 'gro ba kun la mchog tu mdzes //
translated: Your body is most beautiful to all beings.

original: dpe med thugs rje'i rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: dpe med thugs rje'i rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das //
translated: BhagavƒÅn, ocean of incomparable compassion,

original: khyod ni rgyu med gnyen du skye bos shes //
analyzed: khyod ni rgyu med gnyen du skye bos shes //
translated: you are known as the friend without cause.üîΩYou have destroyed actions, know play, and are graceful.

original: byed pa rnams bcom rol pa rig cing sgeg / khyod ni yul la zhen pa yongs su bor //
analyzed: byed pa rnams bcom rol pa rig cing sgeg / khyod ni yul la zhen pa yongs su bor //
translated: You have abandoned attachment to objects.üîΩYour mind is in samƒÅdhi in the deva dhyƒÅnas.

original: lha yi bsam gtan la ni sems mnyam gzhag / khyod ni slong ba po la snyoms pa'i nor //
analyzed: lha yi bsam gtan la ni sems mnyam gzhag / khyod ni slong ba po la snyoms pa'i nor //
translated: You are the wealth that is equal to the poor.

original: thugs rje can khyod gzhan la phan mdzad kyang //
analyzed: thugs rje can khyod gzhan la phan mdzad kyang //
translated: You, compassionate one, benefit others,

original: kho bo 'dir ni srung ba mi mdzad cing //
analyzed: kho bo 'dir ni srung ba mi mdzad cing //
translated: but you do not protect me here.

original: gti mug lto 'phye chen pos sos btab la //
analyzed: gti mug lto 'phye chen pos sos btab la //
translated: I am pierced by the great nƒÅga of delusion,

original: yul la rlom sems pa yis dge las ltung //
analyzed: yul la rlom sems pa yis dge las ltung //
translated: and I fall from virtue through conceit about objects.

original: khyed kyi thugs rje gang de mtha' yas pa'i //
analyzed: khyed kyi thugs rje gang de mtha' yas pa'i //
translated: Your compassion is infinite,

original: skye bo kun la 'phro na gang gi phyir //
analyzed: skye bo kun la 'phro na gang gi phyir //
translated: and it extends to all beings.

original: sdig ldan bdag la srung ba mi mdzad pa //
analyzed: sdig ldan bdag la srung ba mi mdzad pa //
translated: Do not protect me, a sinner?

original: nges pa lags sam mdun nas dud mo 'byin //üîΩmgon po khyed kyi brtse ba mkha' yangs su //
analyzed: nges pa lags sam mdun nas dud mo 'byin // mgon po khyed kyi brtse ba mkha' yangs su //
translated: Is it certain that I am crying out from the front?üîΩO Protector, your love for sentient beings in the vast sky

original: sems can rnams la chu 'dzin sprin ji ltar //
analyzed: sems can rnams la chu 'dzin sprin ji ltar //
translated: Is like a rain cloud.

original: skam pa chu dang mtho dman yul mang por //
analyzed: skam pa chu dang mtho dman yul mang por //
translated: In many places, high and low, dry and wet,

original: ma lus rgyun tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab //
analyzed: ma lus rgyun tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab //
translated: It falls continuously, without interruption.

original: de ltar bcom ldan dran pas bsod nams gang //üîΩdes ni kho bos 'gro ba skyo med 'dir //
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan dran pas bsod nams gang // des ni kho bos 'gro ba skyo med 'dir //
translated: By that merit, O BhagavƒÅn,

original: po tal ke g-yo ba med pa'i gnas //
analyzed: po tal ke g-yo ba med pa'i gnas //
translated: May I be born in the immovable realm of Potala,

original: rnam rol sna tshogs mdzes par skye bar gyur //
analyzed: rnam rol sna tshogs mdzes par skye bar gyur //
translated: And manifest various beautiful forms in this world.

original: zhes pa 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la /
analyzed: zhes pa 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la /
translated: This praise to the feet of noble Avalokite≈õvara

original: tsarya d'i pa zhabs kyis bstod pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: tsarya d'i pa zhabs kyis bstod pa rdzogs so /
translated: By CƒÅryadƒÅsa is completed.

original: // / sgra mkhan chen po rgyal ba'i snyan gyi zhal snga nas /
analyzed: // / sgra mkhan chen po rgyal ba'i snyan gyi zhal snga nas /
translated: By the great grammarian Jayami≈õra,

original: lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
translated: And translated by the ≈öƒÅkya monk-translator Nyima Gyaltsen Pal Zangpo.
